radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Posteroanterior, oblique, and lateral radiographs of the left hand
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bony ankylosis of all interphalangeal joints, sparing only the distal interphalangeal joint of the middle finger; resorption of the ungual tufts of the distal phalanges; loss of soft tissue and contracture of the fingers to a flexed position.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Posteroanterior, oblique, and lateral radiographs of the right hand
radiographic_examinations.findings: Contracture of the fingers to a flexed position; all joint spaces were preserved; absence of erosion, joint space loss, or bony ankylosis; lack of acroosteolysis at the distal phalanges.
